title: Generate a new Angular component including Storybook related files.

name.description: Enter the name of the component.
name.x-prompt: Enter the name of the component.

path.description: The path to create the simple component within.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

spec.description: Specifies if a spec file is generated.

flat.description: Flag to indicate if a directory is created.

export.description: Flag to indicate if the component should also be exported.

skipStory.description: When true, does not create a story for the component.
